description: The Howling Wind Fleece Beanie is best for those chilly morning bike commutes or early fall hikes. The polyester fabric is wind resistant and has reflective details to help keep you visible in low light. The extended ear coverage and under-helmet fit make this beanie ideal for outdoor activities when you need extra protection from the cold. Ideal for shoulder season and active cool weather adventures, the Howling Wind Fleece Beanie is a fall and winter essential.
name: Howling Wind Fleece Beanie
